item.title: A Simple Parent Class for JADE Agents
item.description: In this article, I will not talk about how JADE works. I assume that you are already familiar with the framework. If this is not the case, you can check out JADE website first. Let’s get to it. Communication is the heart of every agent-based system. If your agents do not talk to one another, what’s the point of having them? In order to establish connections between your agents (a.k.a sending messages), you need to have the destination address.
